hist_kodak_bell: The Liberty Bell is a historic symbol of freedom and democracy located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The bell, which was cast in 1776 to celebrate the United States' declaration of independence from Great Britain, has become an iconic landmark and a popular tourist attraction. Visitors can take a guided tour of the Liberty Bell and its surrounding historic district, which includes the National Constitution Center and Independence Hall, where the Declaration of Independence was signed in 1776.
hist_kodak_independence: Independence Hall is a historic landmark in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania that played a key role in the birth of the United States of America. It is the site of the signing of the Declaration of Independence in 1776, and is considered one of the most important buildings in American history. Visitors can take tours of the interior and learn about the events that led to the creation of the United States. The building is surrounded by beautiful gardens and is located in the heart of Philadelphia's historic district. It is a must-see attraction for any tourist visiting the city.
